importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: This is the date when Biden completed his radiation therapy course, marking a significant milestone in his prostate cancer treatment journey.
This is when Biden's office confirmed the diagnosis of an aggressive form of prostate cancer that had spread to his bones.
This is when Biden began a pill regimen for prostate cancer treatment, indicating early intervention in his care plan.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The period from May to October 2025 covers the progression of Bidenâ€™s treatment, from diagnosis and initial therapy to completion of radiation therapy.

keyTakeAways: Former President Joe Biden completed a course of radiation therapy for prostate cancer, a significant step in his ongoing treatment.
The cancer was diagnosed as aggressive and had spread to his bones, prompting a comprehensive treatment plan.
Biden began a pill regimen earlier in 2025 and underwent Mohs surgery for skin cancer, showing a multifaceted approach to his health.
His daughter Ashley shared a video and photo celebrating the completion of radiation therapy, highlighting both personal and public sentiment around his courage.
Biden remains active in public life, with scheduled events including a speech in Boston and an appearance in Omaha, underscoring his resilience and public role despite illness.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Former President Joe Biden has completed a full course of radiation therapy as part of his treatment for an aggressive form of prostate cancer that had spread to his bones. He began a pill regimen earlier in 2025 and has undergone Mohs surgery for skin cancer, showing a multifaceted approach to managing his health. His daughter Ashley shared a video and photo celebrating the completion of treatment, expressing gratitude to medical staff at Penn Medicine Radiation Oncology in Philadelphia. Despite the challenges, Biden remains active in public life, with upcoming appearances including a speech at the Edward M. Kennedy Institute and an event for the Nebraska Democratic Party. The article highlights both his personal resilience and the broader public attention on his health journey.
title: Biden completes a course of radiation therapy for cancer treatment
